docs.abstract: Article by Henry M Wriston, pres emitus of Brown Univ, on natl health ins; illus
docs.lead_paragraph: We are to have health insurance. The politicians have decided that individuals cannot exercise responsibility. Our Washington mentors will give us a legislative monster of 600 to 700 pages. It will help some sick people, bloat the bureaucracy and glut the courts.
